titles.title: Making appropriations for energy and water development and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2020, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-83, by Ms. Kaptur.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 58.
